page.title: 12Shipbourne C.P. School.
page.content: Shipbourne school was built in 1852 as Shipbourne National and Industrial School.It is made from Kentish ragstone and red brick. There are now 50 pupils who come from the village and Tonbridge but in the past century there were as many as 120 because there were no schools in the neighbouring villages. We do maths,creative writing,art, sport and music.We do many projects for which we visit places of interest.Each term we hold a concert and at Christmas time we perform a pantomime.Although we are a small school we have a swimming pool,a computer and a film projector. Debbie.
